page.title: 04SOUTH CAVE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: The Sports Centre was opened in 1975. It was built as part of the school building, and the facilities are shared. The school has the use of the sports hall for 20 hours a week and the centre has the use of the school hall for 60 hours a week. The sports offered by the centre are badminton, volleyball, football, basketball, netball, keep-fit, gymnastics, pool, judo, table-tennis, golf and coaching. It is also used for discos, child nursery, meetings, sunbeds and blood donors. Most people in South Cave use the centre for recreation and people travel from as far as thirteen miles to their clubs.
